verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: said] [ARG1: imposing solar tariffs would help domestic companies . But China ’s surprise decision to slash installations is negating those gains , and shares of U.S. manufacturers are plunging] .

President Donald Trump said [V: imposing] [ARG1: solar tariffs] would help domestic companies . But China ’s surprise decision to slash installations is negating those gains , and shares of U.S. manufacturers are plunging .
